channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Malicious damage to newly-planted tree, 3rd July
item.description:
The newly-planted tree outside no. 18 appears to have been cut - twice. The second cut was successful. The damaged upper portion of the tree fell but remained very slightly attached. A neighbour removed it completely and put it in their green bin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Bisley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
